channel.title: Year In Review on Adam Israel
channel.description: Recent content in Year In Review on Adam Israel

item.title: Quick Stats – 2010 vs. 2011 submissions
item.description: I thought it’d be interesting to look at some rough numbers, based on my Duotrope stats, year over year. 2010 13 submissions to 10 different markets 4 stories on submission 13 rejections, 5 personal (38%) 10 markets 0 acceptances 2011 43 submissions to 36 different markets 11 stories on submission 39 rejections, 16 personal (41%) 4 acceptances Misc. Stats Each year saw one story pulled from circulation after one submission (one was a reprint from 2008)
